typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.BronzeSword: For taking care of small problems.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.PatrolFlag: Used with the Patrol Tool. Tells your knights where to keep watch!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.PatrolTool: Left Click to set patrol points, Right click to create patrol. Left click on existing patrols to change patrol type.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Miner: A good machine can mine twice as fast as any human! Requires a good supply of wood or coal. Crank to start!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.MachinistBench: Machinist's need this bench to repair machines on. The Machinist monitors all machies within 20 blocks of the bench.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.StoneTurret: 50 Physical Damage per shot. Fires a little slower than a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.BronzeArrowTurret: 100 Physical Damage per shot. Fires a little slower than as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.CrossbowTurret: 300 Physical Damage per shot. Fires a little slower than as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.MatchlockTurret: 500 Physical Damage per shot. Fires a little slower than as a Colonist.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.GateLever: Opens all Iron Gates within 20 blocks of it automatically every morning, and closes them every night. Needs a Machinist to maintain it.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Gate: Iron Gate. Needs a Gate Lever to open.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.ApothecaryTable: Used to make medicines, bandages and magical reagents such as mana.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Anitbiotic: Use on bandages for extra fast healing.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Bandage: Instantly heals for 20 health then heals for 40 health over 5 seconds.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.TreatedBandage: Instantly heals for 50 health then heals for 70 health over 5 seconds.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Mana: Unlocks magical powers! When crafted has a 3% chance to also make Esper.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.TeleportPad: Place 2 to link them. It's that simple! Pick one up and the other will be picked up too! Needs a Machinist to maintain at least one side.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.BuildersWand: Lays out the targeted block. Must have the blocks in your stockpile. Right click to preview, then right click to confirm or Left click to cancel. When not previewing Left click to change modes.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Elementium: Used to make elemental stones and magic items! Has a 3% chance to make Void also.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Esper: Very difficult to capture during the creation of mana. A very powerful reagent for only the most powerful of magical things.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.Void: Rare byproduct from Elementium. Who knows all it's uses...
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AirTurret: Air Turret deals 400 air damage and 100 physical damage per shot.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.EarthTurret: Earth Turret deals 400 earth damage and 100 physical damage per shot.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.FireTurret: Fire Turret deals 400 fire damage and 100 physical damage per shot.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.WaterTurret: Water Turret deals 400 water damage and 100 physical damage per shot.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.VoidTurret: Void Turret  deals 400 void damage and 100 physical damage per shot.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Selector: Selector Box for the Builders Wand. DO NOT PLACE THIS. WHY DO YOU HAVE THIS? YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.milk: Comes from cows... What are cows?
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.lamp: So torch like yet... so block like!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.ironbar: To house the most dangerous of criminals!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.ironbarcorner: To make those nice turns for your cages
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.infiniteruby: A Tier 2 Econmy Block!  So rare!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.infinitesaphi: A super rare Tier 3 Economy Block!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.sandstone: Sandstone is pretty uncommon in this world.  What can you build?
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.limestone: Limestone is pretty interesting.  Ideas flowing?
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.marblepillarb: The bottom of a marble pillar.
How high do you want it?
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.fencecorner: Corners, for those pesky open spots!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.window: I can show you the world!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.woodsupport: Lifts the weight off your shoulders!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.woodsupportud: Lifts the weight off your shoulders!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.woodsupportcu: Lifts the weight off your shoulders!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.hangingbanner: A dusty hanging banner; with the default Banner Colours!
A dusty hanging banner; in red and white!
A dusty hanging banner; in black and white!
A dusty hanging banner; in cyan and black!
A dusty hanging banner; in blue and white!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.simpletable: A place to put your stuff on, without the expense!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.woodencatwalk: When you need a floor, with less resources!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.bench: Perfect for Parks!  And waiting rooms.
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.woodbarrel: A non-functional place to store things!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.cratestack: A pile of non-functional crates, with imaginary storage!
typeuses.Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.crate: A big block-sized crate, for non-functional storage!

Apothecaries1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Apothecary
Apothecaries1.description: Apothecary creates magical reagents such as mana and bandages for you and your colonists.

AdvancedApothecary1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Advanced Apothecary
AdvancedApothecary1.description: Apothecaries learn how to make Treated bandages for powerful healing.

Mana1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Mana!
Mana1.description: Unlocks mana that can be used for magical things!

Teleportation1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Teleportation!
Teleportation1.description: Unlocks Teleporters! Can be crafted, placed in pairs. One side must be maintained by a machinist.

BuildersWand1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Builders Wand
BuildersWand1.description: Unlocks the Builders Wand! Used to lay out a large number of blocks at a time. Can lay out 750 blocks before it breaks.

BetterBuildersWand1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Better Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand1.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1000 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand2.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Even Better Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand2.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1250 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand3.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Super Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand3.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1500 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand4.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Ultra Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand4.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 1750 blocks before it breaks!

BetterBuildersWand5.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Perfect Builders Wand
BetterBuildersWand5.description: Upgrades the Builders Wand to lay out 2000 blocks before it breaks!

Elementium1.name: Pandaros.Settlers.AutoLoad.Elementium
Elementium1.description: Unlocks Elementium. Elementium is transmuted by Apothecary and is used to create powerful magic items and elemental weapons.
